Name: 1st District
Description: A quiet, residential area with plenty of parks and local businesses, ideal for families.

Name: 2nd District
Description: A lively area featuring a mix of modern buildings and green spaces, popular for its local cafes and shops.

Name: 3rd District

Description: A vibrant district with a mix of commercial and residential spaces, offering excellent local amenities.
